thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 09 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Horizon Pharma Q1 Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $0.03

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Horizon Pharma Q1 Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $0.03
text:
May 9 (Reuters) - Horizon Pharma PLC:
* REPORTS STRONG FIRST-QUARTER 2018 ORPHAN AND RHEUMATOLOGY NET SALES GROWTH; INCREASES FULL-YEAR 2018 GUIDANCE AND ANNOUNCES NEW COMPANY OPERATING STRUCTURE TO ENHANCE FOCUS ON RARE DISEASES
* SEES FY 2018 SALES $1.17 BILLION TO $1.2 BILLION * Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.03
* Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.96 * Q1 SALES $223.9 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $233.1 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.06 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA GUIDANCE RANGE TO $390 MILLION TO $415 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
